result.eng: After he had ben living in Germany for two years, his German improved a lot.

result.eng: It makes his mouth water.

result.eng: He raised his hand to scratch his chin.

result.eng: He had the courage to wear t-shirts that were so tight you'd worry his nipples would pierce them.
result.ga: Bhí sé de mhisneach aige t-léinte a chaitheamh a bhí chomh teann sin go mbeadh eagla ort go bpollfadh a dhidíní iad
result.orig: Bhí sé de mhisneach aige t-léinte a chaitheamh a bhí chomh teann sin go mbeadh eagla ort go bpollfadh a dhidíní iad

result.eng: The man pushed his face against the window and made a grimace.

result.eng: There were dark hollows underneath his eyes.

result.eng: The wrinkles on his forehead looked deeper.

result.eng: She would bet that his hair has gotten greyer.

result.eng: Where did the wrinkles in his forehead come from?

result.eng: It was no surprise that an academic life was in store for the young boy when his mother was a medical doctor.
result.ga: Níorbh aon ionadh gurbh é an saol acadúil a bhí i ndán don bhuachaill óg agus a mháthair ina dochtúir leighis

result.ponchtml: Níorḃ aon ionaḋ gurḃ é an saol acadúil a ḃí i ndán don ḃuaċaill óg agus a ṁáṫair ina doċtúir leiġisIt was no surprise that an academic life was in store for the young boy when his mother was a medical doctor.

result.eng: His uncles were teaching mathematics to him.

result.eng: Osama Bin Laden and most of his soldiers are dead now.

result.eng: I had to undergo a close examination of my retina and my fingerprints, like every non-American citizen on his way into the country.
result.ga: Rinneadh scrúdú iomlán ar mo reitine agus ar mo mhéarlorga mar a dhéantar le gach éinne nach saoránach Meiriceánach é ar a bhealach isteach sa tír

result.eng: A microblogging service of its kind [ie Twitter] is probably better suited to a busy person who wants to share his opinions.

result.eng: The brevity of the format (140 characters) forces the writer to avoid verbosity in his thoughts.

result.eng: He was arrested with a gun in his possession.

result.html: Gabhadh é agus gunna ina sheilbh aigeHe was arrested with a gun in his possession.

result.eng: His mother led him by the hand to school.
result.ga: Chuaigh sé lena mháthair ar ghreim láimhe go teach na scoile
result.orig: Chuaigh sé lena mháthair ar ghreim láimhe go teach na scoile
result.html: Chuaigh sé lena mháthair ar ghreim láimhe go teach na scoileHis mother led him by the hand to school.

result.eng: Jamie was left among a pack of other children who were about his own size.
result.ga: Fágadh Séimí i gcuideachta scaifte eile páistí a bhí fána thuairim féin méide
result.orig: Fágadh Séimí i gcuideachta scaifte eile páistí a bhí fána thuairim féin méide

result.eng: Jamie was at the end of his seventh year of age.
result.ga: I gceann a sheacht mblian a bhí Séimí
result.orig: I gceann a sheacht mblian a bhí Séimí
result.html: I gceann a sheacht mblian a bhí SéimíJamie was at the end of his seventh year of age.
result.ponchtml: I gceann a ẛeaċt mblian a ḃí SéimíJamie was at the end of his seventh year of age.

result.eng: Not tribulation but consolation was in Jamie's heart when he had done his confession.
result.ga: Chan dólás croí ach sólás croí a bhí ar Shéimí nuair a bhí a fhaoiside déanta aige
result.orig: Chan dólás croí ach sólás croí a bhí ar Shéimí nuair a bhí a fhaoiside déanta aige
result.html: Chan dólás croí ach sólás croí a bhí ar Shéimí nuair a bhí a fhaoiside déanta aigeNot tribulation but consolation was in Jamie's heart when he had done his confession.

result.eng: But him playing with little boats, at his age!

result.eng: I'll make him keep his naughty brats at home.
result.ga: Tabharfaidh mé air a chuid smugachán dímhúinte a choinneáil aige féin
result.orig: Tabharfaidh mé air a chuid smugachán dímhúinte a choinneáil aige féin

result.eng: They started making fun of Jamie, saying she would be his wife one day.
result.ga: Thoisigh siad a mhagadh ar Sheimí a rá leis gurb í a bheadh mar mhnaoi aige
result.orig: Thoisigh siad a mhagadh ar Sheimí a rá leis gurb í a bheadh mar mhnaoi aige

result.eng: His wife was only dead for a couple of days when people started saying in secret that he was thinking of helping himself to a new one.
result.ga: Ní raibh a bhean marbh ach cupla mí go rabhathas á rá i modh rúin go raibh sé ag smaoineamh ar cheann eile a tharraingt air
result.orig: Ní raibh a bhean marbh ach cupla mí go rabhathas á rá i modh rúin go raibh sé ag smaoineamh ar cheann eile a tharraingt air

result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ a ḃean marḃ aċ cupla mí go raḃaṫas á rá i moḋ rúin go raiḃ sé ag smaoineaṁ ar ċeann eile a ṫarraingt airHis wife was only dead for a couple of days when people started saying in secret that he was thinking of helping himself to a new one.

result.eng: He wouldn't take his head out of the drink. He wouldn't stop drinking.

result.eng: Our ears are deafened by his constant talk of nothing but Babaí.

result.eng: He ate it up from his hand.
